mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe(rec_title, user_id, cat_id, step_id, rec_creatdate, rec_del_chk, rec_blind_chk,rec_view) VALUES(#{rec_title}, #{user_id}, #{cat_id}, #{step_id}, #{rec_creatdate},0,0,0)
INSERT INTO photo(identify_number, photo_number, ori_photo_name, photo_name,cat_id) VALUES(#{identify_number},#{photo_number},#{ori_photo_name}, #{photo_name},#{cat_id})
mapper.select: SELECT recipe_content.rec_content,rec_content_id FROM recipe JOIN recipe_content ON recipe.rec_id = recipe_content.rec_id WHERE recipe.rec_id = #{rec_id};
SELECT food.food_name ,food_quantity , food_id FROM recipe JOIN food ON recipe.rec_id = food.rec_id WHERE recipe.rec_id = #{rec_id};
SELECT photo.photo_number,ori_photo_name, photo_name FROM recipe JOIN photo ON recipe.rec_id = photo.identify_number WHERE recipe.rec_id = #{rec_id} and photo_number >= 1;
SELECT photo.photo_name FROM recipe JOIN photo ON recipe.rec_id = photo.identify_number WHERE recipe.rec_id = #{rec_id} and photo_number = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE recipe SET rec_view = rec_view+1 WHERE rec_id = #{rec_id}
mapper.select: SELECT rec_id, user_id, rec_title, rec_view FROM recipe ORDER BY rec_id DESC
SELECT photo.photo_name FROM recipe JOIN photo ON recipe.rec_id = photo.identify_number WHERE photo_number = 0;
select teg_list.tag from tag join teg_list on teg_list.tag_id = tag.tag_id where tag.rec_id = #{rec_id};
